comments: she is very nice however she does rush thru material. a lecture one week a test the next. she gave us quizzes to help us boost our grade dropped the lowest and at the end averaged all the quizzes together as one test.( along with 3 other regular tests, so a total of 4 test grades) You must study hard and ask questions, but an A is possible.

worse professor ever. when i saw the comments the first week of class on this professor i should have dropped. not good at teaching and she should be teaching a math class because all her exams are math problems. her exams are not what she tells u to study. dont take her class because u will fail. worse prof i ever saw, wish i had dropped her class
Nice person but not a great professor. Rushes through material. Very unclear.

She is really nice but she gives brief summaries of 3 chapters with in a week or two and theb there a test every 2 weeks. She dose not assign homework or projects but, this class would require a lot of studying and focus
